title: PBS Nova - S27E19 - Global Warming: What's Up With The Weather
description:
"Deadly flooding in Africa, catastrophic hurricanes in the U.S. with record-high temperatures worldwide. Are these natural, temporary glitches in our global climate, or is the devastation the result of global warming? The weather is different now but why? Find out when NOVA and FRONTLINE join forces to determine What's Up with the Weather?"
